item.title: Trump makes unproven link between autism and Tylenol
item.description: Some studies have suggested an association between the two, but experts say there is no causal relationship.

item.title: Three West African countries to quit International Criminal Court
item.description: The three military juntas, who came to power through coups, say the judicial body is 'incapable' of handling 'proven war crimes'.

item.title: Copenhagen and Oslo airports forced to close temporarily due to drone sightings
item.description: Both airports have been reopened, with Danish police unable to confirm origin of drones.

item.title: Super typhoon hits Philippines as thousands evacuate
item.description: Ragasa has hit northern Philippines and is barrelling towards southern China.

item.title: NZ woman found guilty of killing her two children in 'suitcase murders'
item.description: Hakyung Lee, 44, faces a maximum sentence of life in prison.
